directions: Pour the pineapple juice, cranberry juice, and water into a clean, well-washed  coffee percolator. Place the brown sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks, and salt in the basket of the percolator, and assemble the coffee percolator. Cover, plug in the cord, and perk. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle unsweetened pineapple juice
1 (64 fluid ounce) bottle cranberry juice cocktail
title: Spiced Percolator Punch
